mysetdiff

PURPOSE

MYSETDIFF Set difference of two sets of positive integers (much faster than built-in setdiff)

SYNOPSIS

function C = mysetdiff(A,B)

DESCRIPTION 

 MYSETDIFF Set difference of two sets of positive integers (much faster than built-in setdiff)
 C = mysetdiff(A,B)
 C = A \ B = { things in A that are not in B }

0001 function C = mysetdiff(A,B)
0002 % MYSETDIFF Set difference of two sets of positive integers (much faster than built-in setdiff)
0003 % C = mysetdiff(A,B)
0004 % C = A \ B = { things in A that are not in B }
0005 
0006 if isempty(A)
0007   ma = 0;
0008 else
0009   ma = max(A);
0010 end
0011 
0012 if isempty(B)
0013   mb = 0;
0014 else
0015   mb = max(B);
0016 end
0017 
0018 if ma==0 
0019   C = [];
0020 elseif mb==0
0021   C = A;
0022 else % both non-empty
0023   %bits = sparse(1, max(ma,mb));
0024   bits = zeros(1, max(ma,mb));
0025   bits(A) = 1;
0026   bits(B) = 0;
0027   C = A(logical(bits(A)));
0028 end
